name: Camp's Bay Tunic/ smock top (with bib-front) handmade paper sewing pattern and instructions
description:
A versatile, easy-to-wear smock top/tunic with bib-front for you to make at home. Designed and pattern-drafted by me with detailed, illustrated instructions.

Please convo me with questions/ custom orders etc.

S/M (up to 96cm/38 inch bust). This is an easy-fitting top that can be worn alone or layered up.

Alternative yoke patterns coming soon!

Custom pattern-drafting available.

Thanks for looking.

© Sarah K Eagle 2010. All rights reserved.
Patterns are not for reproduction or to make products for commercial sale.

name: Betty's Bay tunic/smock top (with high yoke) handmade paper sewing pattern and instructions
description:
A versatile, easy-to-wear smock top/tunic with high yoke for you to make at home. Designed and pattern-drafted by me with detailed, illustrated instructions.

Please convo me with questions/ custom orders etc.

S/M (up to 96cm/38 inch bust). This is an easy-fitting garment, designed to be worn on its own in summer, or to be layered up in cooler months.

Other sizes available on request.

Alternative yoke patterns for this tunic coming soon!

Custom pattern-drafting available.

Thanks for looking!

© Sarah K Eagle 2010. All rights reserved.
Patterns are not for reproduction or to make products for commercial sale.

name: Handmade red check cap sleeve top with pocket
description:
A lovely, simple shape to wear in the summer. Bold, red/burgundy check- so SS10. Handmade by me using high quality materials and techniques (serged edges/ bias-bound neckline). 

Size: Small (fits up to 36 inch bust)

Please convo me with questions. I can make to custom measurements or draft a pattern to custom measurements too.

Thanks for looking!

name: Handmade Chambray skirt
description:
This skirt is completely handmade by me (designed, pattern-drafted and constructed). It is a prototype of a design I am working on. There are some needle marks around the buttonholes, as I decided to position them vertically, rather than horizontally.

100% cotton chambray
Vintage, yellow, plastic buttons
Size: small/ medium: to fit waist 30 inches

Please convo me if interested.
Thanks for looking.

name: IKAT CAP SLEEVE TOP with buttoned shoulders
description:
This item is completely hand made by me from start to finish (designed, pattern-drafted and constructed). It is a prototype for a design I'm working on.

Hand-woven cotton Ikat fabric from the Cloth Shop in London's Berwick Street.

Plastic and mother-of-pearl buttons at shoulders with contrast red thread used.

Contrast check facing used and all edges serged/ overlocked.

To fit up to size 36 inch bust (made to fit me and I wear a UK 10/12; US 8).

Please convo me if interested.
Thanks for looking!
